description:
DIETURE APP ABOUT US:

Download the app and transform your health with customized food and a dietitian
supporting your goals.

WHAT IS IT?

Through the Dieture app, we customize, cook, and deliver ready-to-microwave
healthy food daily to subscribers who want to lose weight or eat healthy.

HOW TO SIGN UP?

A. You can sign up with us by answering a quiz on our mobile application, built using
nutrition algorithms created by our dietitians, or
B. Use our FREE clinical consultation with our in-house qualified dietitians and body
composition tests.

MEMBERSHIP

The app then presents you with a menu of 30 daily options for each meal plan,
swapping them with a new set of 30 options every day of the month.
Based on the selections, our highly qualified chefs cook delicious yet scientifically
backed healthy meals and send them to you - chilled, ready-to-microwave meals
customized to your nutrition needs.

SUPPORT

The app integrates with your smart devices to track your progress. In addition, our in-
house dietitians follow your progress by providing body composition tests and
consultations at our clinic to ensure you are on track.

CHAT THROUGH APP

You can contact our Chat Support team for any help or support at any time.

WHAT’S SPECIAL?

1. 350+ nutrients counted chef-designed dish choices.
2. Option to build your custom meals
3. Classic, Keto and vegetarian plans
4. Option to choose from any of the meal plans, not just the one you selected.
5. Built-in dietitian-designed algorithms on the app.
6. Flag all your allergies and dislikes: E.g., Gluten, dairy, nuts, berries.
7. From 700 to 3000 Calories available.
8. Skip meals at any time.
9. Add additional products from our add-on menu.

Join the world’s largest walking community!
StepsApp turns your iPhone into a sleek, powerful step counter — no extra devices needed. 

Just slip your phone into your pocket and get moving.
Set goals. Count steps. Burn calories.

STEPSAPP INCLUDES

• Automatic step counting
• Stunning charts and animations
• NEW: Workouts with Map Tracking, Heart Rate Zones and Insights.
• Apple Health integration
• Apple Watch support
• Workouts with GPS tracking
• Active calories
• Insights
• Trends. Totals. Records.
• Powerful day, week, and month views
• Awards with 3D medals
• iOS 14 widgets for your home screen
• Dark and Light Mode
• Six beautiful colors – also change the app icon
• iMessage app
• Today widget
• More Daily goals & Notifications
• Social media sharing
• Wheelchair support
• Export data
• No extra hardware required

YOUR ACTIVITY AT A GLANCE

• Quick overview of your daily steps, distance, time, floors climbed, and active calories.
• Beautiful weekly, monthly, and yearly charts.
• See your progress directly in the today widget.
• Display your current step count or wheelchair pushes on the app icon.
• Notifications when you have reached your daily activity goal.
• Weekly Report
• Set and reach your goal… step by step.

APPLE WATCH & APPLE HEALTH

• Synchronize and import your activity data via Apple Health.
• Track your activity with your iPhone and your Apple Watch.
• StepsApp will merge your steps automatically.
• Now with Apple Watch workouts with GPS tracking.
• Securely store your actively burned calories in Apple Health.

STEPSAPP FOR EVERYONE

• Also enjoy StepsApp with VoiceOver.
• Instead of steps, track wheelchair pushes with your Apple Watch.
• StepsApp supports more than 20 languages.

CUSTOMIZE & SHARE

• Spice up your charts with six beautiful colors.
• Also change the App Icon
• Share your achievements on social media directly from  StepsApp...
• …or with our brand new iMessage app!

Your activity tracker to form a habit of walking, running, hiking 
and weight loss.

StepsApp Privacy Policy:
https://steps.app/privacy

* StepsApp requires iPhone 5s or newer

Strava makes fitness tracking social. We house your entire active journey in one spot – and you get to share it with friends. Here’s how:

• Record everything – runs, rides, hikes, yoga and over 30 other sport types. Think of Strava as the home of your movement.

• Discover anywhere – our Routes tool uses de-identified Strava data to intelligently recommend popular routes based on your preferences. You can also build your own.

• Build a support network – Strava’s about celebrating movement. Here you’ll find your community and cheer each other on.

• Train smarter – get data insights to understand your progress and see how you improve. Your Training Log is the record of all your workouts.

• Get more from your workout – Powered by AI, Athlete Intelligence turns workout data into into instant insights. Keeping you motivated and ready for the next workout – without the guesswork.

• Move safer – share your real-time location with loved ones while outdoors for an extra layer of safety.

• Sync your favourite apps and devices – Strava is compatible with thousands of them (Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin – you name it).

• Join and create challenges – join millions in monthly challenges to chase new goals, collect digital badges and stay accountable.

• Embrace the unfiltered – your feed on Strava is filled with real efforts from real people. That’s how we motivate each other.

• Whether you’re a world-class athlete or a total beginner, you belong here. Just record and go.

Strava includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.
Strava uses HealthKit to export your Strava activities into the Health app and to read heart rate and biometric data.

You can subscribe and pay on the App Store, using your Apple ID. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the ‘Manage Subscription’ page in settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Terms of Service: https://www.strava.com/legal/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.strava.com/legal/privacy

Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy  
https://flo.health/terms-of-use 

Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.

Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

Introducing Afiya MMCH, the ultimate patient engagement platform from Qatar to the world.

Afiya is designed to give you personalized and efficient care in your wellness journey.

Afiya empowers hospitals to seamlessly integrate and evaluate patient engagement, enhancing thier overall care experience.

WHOOP is the leading wearable that turns comprehensive health insights into daily action. By capturing dozens of data points every second, WHOOP delivers personalized Sleep, Strain, Recovery, Stress, and health insights—24/7. WHOOP uses those insights to provide coaching based on your body’s unique physiology and recommends everything from when to go to bed to new daily behaviors that will help you reach your goals.

If you’re new to WHOOP, you can try both the wearable and app free for 1 month. Terms and conditions apply.

WHOOP is screenless, so all your data lives in the WHOOP app—for a distraction-free focus on your health. The WHOOP app requires a WHOOP wearable.

How it works:

Healthspan*: A powerful way to quantify your age and slow your Pace of Aging. Backed by leading longevity research, it pinpoints the daily habits that impact your long-term health.

Sleep: WHOOP helps you understand how well you sleep each night by measuring your Sleep Performance. Every morning, WHOOP provides a Sleep score from 0 to 100%. Sleep Planner calculates how much sleep you need to recover, tailored to your habits, schedule, and goals. You can even set a Haptic Alarm that wakes when you're fully rested, or at a specific time, with gentle vibration. Quality sleep is essential for improving your healthspan, metabolic mental resilience, recovery, and performance.

Recovery: WHOOP lets you know how ready you are to perform by measuring your heart rate variability, resting heart rate, sleep, and respiratory rate. You'll get a daily Recovery score on a scale of 1 to 99%. When you're in the green, you're ready for strain, when you're in the yellow or red, you may want to evaluate your training program.

Strain: WHOOP does more than just track your activity–it measures cardiovascular and muscular exertion to give you the most comprehensive view of the demands you put on your body. Each day, Strain Target will provide a Strain score from 0 to 21 and recommend your optimal target exertion range based on your Recovery score.

Stress: WHOOP gives you daily insights to pinpoint your stressors, understand your physiological response, and discover techniques to help manage. Get a real-time stress score from 0-3 and, based on your score, choose a breathwork session to enhance your alertness or increase relaxation.

Behaviors: WHOOP tracks over 160+ daily habits and behaviors—like alcohol intake, medication, and more—to better understand how these behaviors impact your body. WHOOP provides weekly guidance for behavior change and helps set accountability goals with the Journal and Weekly Plan features.

WHOOP Coach: Ask questions about your health & fitness and get highly personalized, on-demand answers. Using your unique biometric data, the latest performance science, and generative AI, WHOOP Coach generates responses on everything from training plans to why you’re feeling tired.

Menstrual Cycle Insights: Go beyond period tracking to better understand your fifth vital sign and get tailored cycle-based insights.

What else you can do in the WHOOP app:

• Dig into the details: See heart rate zones, VO₂ Max, steps, and more trends over time to adjust your behaviors, training, sleep and more based on your goals.

• Join a team: Stay motivated and accountable by joining a team. Chat directly with your teammates in the app, or as a coach, see how your team's training is going.

• Apple Health: WHOOP integrates with Apple's Health app to sync activities and personalize your experience.

WHOOP provides products and services designed for general fitness and wellness purposes. WHOOP products and services are not medical devices, not intended to treat or diagnose any disease, and should not be used as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. All content available through WHOOP products and services is for general informational purposes only.

Discover the future of health and performance.

*Some availability restrictions apply.

Your go-to, integrated health and fitness companion. Whether you want to kick-start your fitness life, keep track of your health, or conveniently manage your smart wearable devices, the Huawei Health app has what you're looking for. Keep your data private, or share it with your loved ones, the power's yours. The latest in health and fitness technology, made simple, secure, and easy to use.

Keeps Up with Your Every Move
Keep track of your health journey. Huawei Health records your activity, supporting over 100 different sports, from beginner to advanced levels. See your workout data clearly every step of the way, so you can be sure you're reaching your goals. A wonderful world of fitness at the tip of your fingers.

Run How You Want
A simpler way to run that can benefit anyone. The app is able to record and map out your route as you're running, all while displaying key information so you can stay on target.

An Amazing Journey
Share your health journey with your friends and family. Your outdoor workout routes can be generated into videos with music for you to proudly share. Use Dynamic tracking to create videos to share on social media to inspire yourself and others with your fitness journey.

A New View on Health
See your life in amazing detail with Huawei Health stats. The app keeps records of your heart rate, weight, sleep quality, step count and more. All your data is shown in clear, dynamic graphs so you have a better understanding of your health in a more accessible way.

[health package]
·Synchronize with the weight data in healthkit. When you use the healthy weight data of Huawei mobile phone, this data will be synchronized and recorded in healthkit.
·Synchronize with motion data in healthkit. You can automatically synchronize the exercise data recorded in Huawei health to healthkit. Similarly, Huawei sports health can also obtain the exercise data from healthkit.

--------------------
Huawei Health app is not intended for medical use, and all data is for reference only.
You should seek a doctor’s advice in addition to using this app and before making any medical decisions.

--------------------
[Description of auto-renewing subscriptions]
1. Instructions for continuous monthly subscription
--Subscription period: 1 month
- Subscription price: 1 yuan for the first month, 15 yuan per month thereafter
2. Instructions for subscribing and unsubscribing
--Payment: Debit through the user's iTunes account, and the user will pay immediately after confirming the purchase
--Renewal: Apple’s iTunes account will be deducted within 24 hours of expiration. After the deduction is successful, the subscription period will be extended by one subscription period
--Unsubscribe method
Solution 1. Open the Appstore on your phone, click the blue avatar icon in the upper right corner, and then go to "Subscription"> "Huawei Sports Health" to cancel the subscription.
Solution 2: 24 hours before the expiration of the current subscription period, go to the iTunes/Apple ID "Settings Management" page and turn off the automatic renewal. Cancellation within 24 hours before expiration will result in a subscription fee.
--Automatic renewal service agreement(EULA): https://consumer.huawei.com/minisite/cloudservice/health/monservice-terms.htm?country=CN&language=zh_Hans_CN
--Membership Agreement (including user privacy agreement): https://consumer.huawei.com/minisite/cloudservice/health/member-terms.htm?country=CN&language=zh_Hans_CN

Track progress toward your nutrition, water, fitness, and weight loss goals with MyFitnessPal. This all-in-one food tracker and health app is like having a nutrition coach, meal planner, and food diary with you at all times.

MyFitnessPal isn’t another restrictive diet app. This is a health app to help you learn about your habits … see how you eat … make smarter food choices … find motivation & support ... and conquer your health goals.

Download and start your free 30-day Premium trial to access exclusive food tracking, fitness logging tools, and expert guidance. You’ll soon discover why MyFitnessPal is the #1 food and nutrition tracker in the U.S., a GQ 2020 Fitness Awards “Best Fitness App,” and has been featured in the New York Times, Wall Street Journal, the Today Show, and U.S. News & World Report.

SO MUCH MORE THAN A CALORIE TRACKER & FOOD JOURNAL

It’s like having a dietitian, personal trainer, and nutrition coach at your fingertips.

Log Food – Easy-to-use tools make food tracking quick and simple
Record Activity – Add workouts and steps with the fitness tracker
Customize Your Goals – Weight loss, weight gain, weight maintenance, nutrition & fitness
See Your Progress – Track at a glance, or analyze nutrition & calories in detail
Learn From a Registered Dietitian – Meal Plans customized for your target calories, whether you want to lose or gain weight—with access to our Meal Planner tool
Stay Inspired – 500+ healthy goal-focused recipes and 50 workouts keep routines fresh and fun
Connect With Community – Find friends and motivation in our active forums

A CLOSER LOOK AT FEATURES & BENEFITS

Gain Valuable Insights Through Food Logging

Discover which foods fuel you best. It’s not just a diet app, calorie counter to lose weight, or a faster way to fat loss—it’s about holding yourself accountable and understanding what you put in your body.

One of the Largest Food Databases – Track calories in over 14 million foods (including restaurant dishes)
Fast & Easy Food Tracker Tools – Type to search, add foods from your history, or quick-add calories
Bar Code & Meal Scan: Log store-bought foods and entire meals using your phone’s camera
Calorie Tracker – Automatically count calories and see your daily progress
Macro Tracker – See carbs, fat & protein breakdown by gram or percentage—no need for a separate carb tracker or keto diet app!
Nutrition Tracker and Insights – Analyze nutrition intake and set specific goals for macros, cholesterol, sodium, fiber & more
Water Logging – Easily keep track of your water intake. 

Customize Your App Experience

Choose settings that help you achieve your goals.

Custom Goals – Track calories by meal or day, set up macro goals & more
Personalized Dashboards – Pick stats you want to see at a glance
Net Carbs Mode/Carb Tracker – To simplify a low carb or keto diet, view net (not total) carbs
Protein Counter – Set your protein goals and track how much you eat during the day
Add Your Own Foods/Meal Tracker – Save recipes and meals for quick logging
Connect 50+ Apps & Devices – From fitness tracker and smartwatch apps, including the Health app
Track With Apple Watch – A calorie tracker, water tracker, and macro tracker on your watch face.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS

MyFitnessPal is free to download and use. If you upgrade to MyFitnessPal Premium, we offer monthly & annual auto-renewing subscriptions.

Payment is charged to your credit card through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless you turn off auto-renewal in iTunes Account Settings after purchase, or cancel your subscription at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period.

View our full terms & conditions and privacy policy: https://www.myfitnesspal.com/privacy-and-terms

description:
Download ClassPass today to book fitness classes & appointments at the top studios, gyms, salons and spas near you!

How it works:
• Download the free ClassPass app.
• Sign up for a free trial and get credits to try activities like yoga, pilates, gym visits and more from some of our top-rated businesses — on us.
• Browse studios, gyms, salons & spas near you (pro tip: filter by reservation type, location, time & more to easily find what you’re looking for!).
• Book classes & appointments instantly without needing to create additional accounts or enter payment details.
• After your trial, customize a plan that works best with your fitness & wellness routine.
• Roll over unused credits up to the number of credits in your next month’s plan.
• You’re never locked in – change or cancel your plan at any time.

How to make the most of your membership:
• Access thousands of the world’s leading fitness studios, gyms, salons and spas including Flywheel, Orangetheory Fitness, CorePower, Crunch, Pure Barre, [solidcore], Y7, Row House, Restore, Glosslab, Glab & Go, Chillhouse & more!
• Browse a list of recommended studios, gyms, salons & spas curated just for you.
• Bookmark your favorites.
• Invite friends to class and earn rewards.
• Connect with friends who are already ClassPassers.
• Receive badges to celebrate your milestones and share them with friends.
• Read reviews & ratings from other ClassPassers to know what to expect with each reservation.

ClassPass is available in more than 30 countries including: USA, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, United Kingdom, Ireland, France, Germany, Netherlands, Spain, Portugal, Switzerland, Austria, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Norway, Singapore, Hong Kong, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia, Philippines, China, India, the United Arab Emirates, Brazil, Argentina & Chile

Unlock your full potential with the F45 Qatar app — your personal gateway to booking F45 Training sessions across all Qatar locations. Designed to make your fitness journey simple, motivating, and seamless, this app puts the power of functional training right at your fingertips.

Key Features:

View real-time class schedules across all F45 Qatar studios

Instantly book or cancel your sessions

Receive exclusive F45 Qatar updates, challenges & events

Sync with your calendar and get smart reminders

Personalized dashboard to monitor your consistency & progress

Whether you're just starting or pushing towards peak performance, the F45 Qatar app is built to support your goals with every rep, every class, every day. No more waiting, no more excuses — just fast, functional fitness, made simple.

Join the F45 community in Qatar and experience the world’s most innovative group training.

Team Training. Life Changing. Now in Your Pocket.

Training Plans*, Guided Runs**, wellness tips, run challenges — NRC has all the tools you need to start running, keep running, and enjoy running more. Pace yourself with the Nike community. 5k to 10k, Half Marathon and beyond.

Move With Us

If you're ready to run, our coaches, trainers, athletes and experts have you covered in the Nike Run Club app. Download today to become a Nike Member and gain access to 300+ free guided runs and workouts from Nike’s best. Running tracker, Guided Runs**, or Training Plans* - pace yourself with motivation and guidance from Nike experts and receive encouragement for every run.

Prioritise your wellbeing on a daily basis and stay motivated with the Nike community. Training or just having fun - create and share challenges with friends or join one with the global community. Running app communities makes fitness all the more rewarding. Workout with the Nike community today!

Training for a marathon, developing a healthier mindset, or beginning your fitness journey - whatever moves you want to make, the Nike Run Club app is here for it. . Workout and run better with NRC.

Treadmill run or hitting the trails — Run alongside the Nike community today.

RUN TRACKER: TRACK & STORE RUNS
• Training tools for all - KM tracker, GPS route, pace, and heart rate
• Workout pace and distance tracker - 5k to 10k, Half Marathon & more, keep up with your goals with NRC
• Activity tracker syncs with your Apple watch and supported devices to provide constant support
• Treadmill or trail - log your distance, no matter how you get your run in

TRAINING PLANS & GUIDED RUNS
• Coach or Trainer - Begin your fitness journey with a trusted Nike expert
• Training Plans* with NRC give you a goal to run toward and the guidance to reach it - Progress on your terms
• Workout with Plans for all levels - Fitness for beginners to regulars with interactive Training Plans* for all goals
• Half Marathon training, 4-Week Get Started Training Plans and more - Workout with Training Plans* that best suit you
• Marathon Training Plan - Begin the ultimate 12-week fitness journey*
• Audio Guided Runs** - Unlock over 300+ free guided runs for whatever your level, mood or mindset is
• Coach, celebrity or Nike legend - Gain motivation from Nike’s best like Eliud Kipchoge
• Running coach guidance with NRC’s Guided Runs - Treadmill, speed intervals and more**
• Fitness community - Receive and send friends motivating in-run audio cheers

RUN CHALLENGES
• 5k to 10k, Half Marathon and beyond - Earn badges and trophies for streaks and personal bests and celebrate every move you make with Nike
• Pace yourself with the Nike community - Join and share challenges with friends via social media or messaging
• Fitness tracker - Track progress towards challenge goals
• Pace or distance - Beat running bests with the support of your worldwide run club
• Run in NRC running challenges or create one with your friends

KM TRACKER & SHOE TAGGING
• KM tracker records the distance on all your shoes
• Pace can be recorded for each pair - Learn which ones you run the fastest in
• 5k, Half Marathons and more - Enjoy your runs and we will remind you when to switch your shoes for a new pair

Nike Run Club: Your Guide to a Better Run.

-

Nike Run Club works with Apple Health to sync workouts and record heart-rate data.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.

Apple Music: used to access music library to play music during workouts.

*Training Plans available in the US, UK, JP, CN, BR, FR, DE, ES, IT.
**Guided Runs available in select countries.

bloater helps you achieve a leaner, more defined face with AI-powered analysis and expert-guided debloating exercises. Using cutting-edge facial scanning technology, the app detects signs of water retention, facial swelling, and bloating—showing you exactly why your face looks puffy. Over 100,000 people have already experienced a transformation with our carefully crafted routines. Take control of your facial appearance today and experience the power of bloater!

HOW TO USE bloater:

1) Upload a photo of your face and answer a few questions
2) Access your bloating analysis and improvement routine
3) Discover personalized insights with your custom debloating routine

SUBSCRIPTION REQUIRED:

* Food bloating analysis
* Personalized debloating routines
* Daily checklist
* Analysis statistics
* Detailed insights
* Custom debloating routine

NOTE: We do not offer health or medical advice. Any and all face analysis, measurements, and recommendations should be viewed as suggestions for entertainment and self-discovery purposes only. Please consult with dermatology professionals for any medical or health concerns. All recommendations and suggestions are intended for informational purposes only.

Please consult a qualified health professional for personalized guidance and support.

Debloating routine recommendations are for entertainment and informational purposes only. Always consult with healthcare providers before making any changes to your health & skin care routine.

Woman's calendar - a convenient period tracker for women. This is a top-rated menstrual tracker for women, and a period tracker for teenagers as well.
 
For anyone who needs to make sure they are having a regular menstrual cycle, this is the perfect app to take out all the guess-work.

- Menstrual cycle calendar, for teens or women trying to keep a regular cycle. 

- Great period book to use as an irregular period tracker, a great period tracker for teenagers. For teens just getting used to pms, and a regular period cycle, you can use this period app to check period dates, amount of period blood, pms cycle, and know what days and how heavy your period should be.
 
- Keep a period log – Always know when your next period should start, how long this cycle will last, check if you’re late, etc. A period calculator app means you can throw away those paper calendars, stop guessing and stop worrying.
   
With this amazing, easy-to-use all-in-one cycle tracker, calendar and calculator, everything is totally under control.

* Supports transferring data to Health app.

PREMIUM ACCOUNT IN THE APP
- You can subscribe to a regularly updated set of skins, reports, and analysis
- The subscription costs $4.99 per month, $9.99 per 3 months, and $19.99 per year
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Combining Mi Fitness with smartwatch or smartband devices, users can track their health and fitness data. 

Mi Fitness supported：Xiaomi Watch Series, Redmi Watch Series, Xiaomi Smart Band Series, Redmi Smart Band Series.

Keep track of your workouts
Map your route, monitor your progress, and achieve your goals. Whether it's walking, running, or biking, you can easily track it right from your phone.
Monitor your health information*
Mi Fitness APP assists you in managing your personal health, helping you to always maintain your optimal state. By connecting Xiaomi or Redmi smartwatch/band devices, important health indicators such as heart rate, sleep, stress, and energy can be monitored and risk warnings generated throughout the day. Health data such as weight and women's health can also be manually recorded and managed.
Sleep better*
In conjunction with Xiaomi or Redmi smartwatch/band devices that has sleep monitoring functionality, you can record your sleep information every night. By conducting in-depth analysis of the different stages of sleep, including deep sleep, light sleep, and rapid eye movement, as well as monitoring your sleep heart rate, breathing quality, body movements, and other sleep-related data, the device generates a personalized sleep report. This report can help remind you to adjust your sleep habits in a timely manner.
Easy payments with wearable device
Link your Mastercard cards to Mi Fitness and enjoy the convenience of making payments on the go with your wearable device.
Ask Alexa for convenient access
With Alexa, you can easily access important features like checking the weather, playing music, and starting a workout. Just ask and you're good to go.
Stay informed with notifications
Receive notifications, messages, and emails directly on your wearable device, so you can stay informed without having to constantly check your phone.

*Disclaimer
Except for the manual health information recording service provided to users, all other health services within the application only synchronize and record the relevant information of the wristband or watch. All health-related data, results, suggestions, etc. are for reference only and are not intended for medical purposes, including self-diagnosis or consultation with a doctor, and are only used for general fitness and health purposes.
Please note that all smartwatches/fitness trackers currently integrated into the application are not medical devices and cannot provide any form of medical services. In case of any physical discomfort, please seek timely advice from medical institutions.

Focus, relax, and sleep through the power of sound. Endel creates AI-powered sounds designed to support your everyday life. Backed by science, and enjoyed by millions worldwide.

Endel is powered by its patented core AI technology. It takes inputs like location, environment, and heart rate, to create the optimal personalized soundscape. This happens on the fly and allows Endel to reconnect your state with your circadian rhythm.

Get access to the following classic soundscapes at home, work, or on the move to relax, concentrate, and minimize distractions and brain fatigue:


• Focus – boosts your productivity by helping you concentrate for longer

• Sleep – soothes you into a deep sleep with soft, gentle sounds

• Relax – calms your mind to create feelings of comfort and safety

• Move – feel grounded and present while walking, hiking, or running

تطبيق الحمل رقم #1 بشهادة المختصين و المستخدمات
تنصح به الطبيبات و المتخصصات في مجال النساء والولادة
يعطيك تواريخ الولادة بشكل دقيق جداً
يقدم معلومات و حقائق عن الحمل بأسلوب سهل و مبسط مع الميزات التالية:
- تحديد موعد الحمل النهائي مرورا بمراحل الحمل.
- تحديد بداية و نهاية الحمل مع اظهار الفترة الحالية بالايام و الاسابيع و الاشهر.
- تزويد المستخدم بحقائق و معلومات عامة عن الحمل.
- خاصية اضافة التنبيهات المجدولة بحيث تساعد الحامل بتذكير مواعيدها الهامة كموعد زيارة الطبيب أو تناول الدواء أو أوقات الراحة.
- في كل اسبوع من فترة الحمل تستطيع الحامل مشاهدة كل مايتعلق بمعلومات سواء عن الجنين او عن الحامل.
- يدعم التقويم الهجري و الميلادي
- يحوي مجتمع تفاعلي للحوامل تطرحين من خلاله تسؤلاتك واستفسارتك وتشاريكن التجارب والخبرات مع الحوامل من كل البلدان 
- استضافة طبيبات استشاريات في تخصص النساء و الولاده والجراحات النسائية التجميليه والعلاجيه

adidas Running is an activity tracker designed for all levels of ability and experience, offering the ideal platform for beginners to start tracking their running journey and logging activities. To help introduce new users to running, numerous adidas Training Plans are available, providing step-by-step guidance that adapts to each user's fitness level—including plans for 3K, 5K, and 10K distances. These plans evolve as users train, making the Walk to Run Training Plan the perfect introduction to running, regardless of previous experience. As you progress, explore additional Training Plans to prepare for your first 10K, half-marathon, marathon, and beyond.
Getting started with adidas Running is simple: download the app, create your account using your personal details, and set a goal to stay motivated and track your fitness journey. You can begin tracking and logging activities immediately, with nearly 100 options available—including running, walking, cycling, hiking, climbing, tennis, and yoga.
Sync your activities effortlessly with Health Connect and a wide range of apps and devices, including Garmin, Polar, Amazfit/Zepp, Coros, Suunto, Wañoo, and many more. This makes tracking your progress easier than ever.
adidas Running is also home to adidas Runners—local and global communities of people staying active together. Find your community and track activities with like-minded individuals, whatever your pace. Stay motivated by joining Challenges and Virtual Races as a group, and earn Badges along the way.
Staying active has never been more social. Share your tracked runs and other activities with your community, receive real-time Live Cheers from friends during workouts, and support others by following and liking their activities.
A wide range of features are available to all users, including detailed activity stats like distance, duration, heart rate, pace, calories burned, and cadence. You’ll also benefit from the Progress Tab, Shoe Tracking, and recommendations. Plus, access expert guidance on Movement, Mindset, Recovery, and gear to support your fitness journey.

Runtastic Terms of Service: https://www.runtastic.com/in-app/iphone/appstore/terms
Runtastic Privacy Policy: https://www.runtastic.com/privacy-notice

تم تطوير صحتي من قبل وزارة الصحة في المملكة العربية السعودية تماشياً مع رؤيتها لتسهيل الوصول للرعاية الصحية وتحسين جودتها وزيادة الوعي الصحي في المجتمع.
 
- تعد صحتي منصة وطنية لصحة سكان المملكة من مواطنين ومقيمين من خلال توفير المعلومات الصحية والخدمات ذات الصلة لأكثر من 24 مليون مستفيد.
 
- تهدف منصة صحتي إلى تمكين الأفراد من الحصول على معلوماتهم الصحية وتلقي الخدمات الطبية الإلكترونية التي تقدمها المؤسسات الصحية المختلفة في المملكة.
 
ضمن استراتيجية الوزارة لتسهيل الوصول للرعاية الصحية وتحسين جودتها جرى العمل على دمج جميع التطبيقات في القطاع الصحي. وتم حتى الان دمج كلا من موعد وتطمن وصحة ورصد وبطاقة التأمين من مجلس الضمان. والعمل مستمر لإكمال الربط مع باقي الخدمات في المنظومة الصحية.
 
- بعض هذه الخدمات تشمل:
مواعيد فحص كوفيد 19: بأكثر من 24 مليون موعد
 
لقاح كوفيد 19: تم تقديم أكثر من 51 مليون جرعة لقاح
 
المواعيد: تم حجز أكثر من 3.8 مليون موعد ما بين حضوري وافتراضي
 
التقارير الطبية (مثل الإجازات المرضية): تم إصدار أكثر من 9.5 مليون تقرير إجازة مرضي
 
استشارة فورية: تقديم أكثر من 1.5 مليون استشارة
 
تعزيز نمط الحياة الصحي والوعي: تسجيل أكثر من 2 مليون فرد في حملة المشي وأكثر من 700 ألف في مبادرة اعرف أرقامك لتسجيل المؤشرات الحيوية.
 
بالإضافة إلى تقديم خدمات أخرى:
المحفظة الصحية
وصفات الأدوية
خدمة طبيبي
لقاحات الأطفال
البحث عن الأدوية (رصد)

Sehhaty is provided by the Ministry of Health in Saudi Arabia, in line with its vision to increase access to care, improve standards of healthcare and increase health awareness in the community.
 
It is the National Population Health Platform for all citizens’ and residents’ health information and related services in Saudi Arabia with over 24 million user registered.
 
It aims to enable individuals to obtain their health information and receive medical e-services provided by different health organizations in the Kingdom.
 
Within the Ministry's strategy to facilitate access to health care and improve, its quality, great achievements have been accomplished   to integrate all applications in the health sector. So far; Mawid, Tetamman, Sehha app., RSD and insurance card from the Council of Health Insurance have been merged. Work is ongoing to complete to merge with the rest of the services in the health systems.
 
Some of these services include:
 
COVID-19 Tests appointments: With +24 Million appointment

COVID-19 Vaccine: +51 Million vaccine dosage administered

Appointments: +3.8 Million physician and virtual appointments booked

Medical Reporting (e.g. Sick leave): +9.5 million Sick leave report issued

Real-time consultation: +1.5 million consultation

Promoting healthy lifestyle and awareness: +2 Million Registered individuals in the walking campaign and +700K in Know Your Numbers Initiative for capturing health related vital signs.

In addition to other services:
Health Wallet

Medication Prescriptions

My Doctor Service

Children Vaccine

Drug Search (RSD)

Sehhaty app needs access to your HealthApp via  HealthKit and CareKit to share your walking activities and the number of steps

Take control of your health – smarter, simpler, and more personal.

Vitaria helps you understand your body better with intelligent insights, AI Doctor Advice, and seamless HealthKit integration — all built with SwiftUI for a modern, smooth experience.

No more messy spreadsheets or disconnected trackers. Every health detail — from blood pressure to hydration — now lives in one secure, easy-to-use space designed with care.

What makes Vitaria different
- AI Doctor Advice – Receive personalized health insights powered by AI to better understand your daily trends and habits.
- HealthKit Integration – Sync your data automatically with Apple Health for a seamless experience across your devices.
- SwiftUI Experience – Enjoy a beautifully designed, fast, and accessible app built natively for iOS.
- Smart & Unified Tracking – Log blood pressure, blood sugar, heart rate, water intake, and medications — all in one app.
- Intelligent Insights – Visual trends, charts, and AI summaries help you see the bigger picture of your health journey.
- Reminders & Notes – Stay consistent with medication and hydration reminders, plus space for personal notes and observations.

Why users love Vitaria
- Simple, clean design that makes health tracking effortless.
- Secure storage — your health data always belongs to you.
- Developed independently, with no third-party templates or clones.
- Regular updates with new insights and features for your well-being.

Privacy & Responsibility

Vitaria is designed as a wellness companion, not a medical device.
It does not diagnose or treat medical conditions.
For any health concerns, always consult your healthcare professional.

Your data stays private — stored securely on your device and synced safely via HealthKit when enabled.
We never share personal information without your consent.

【VitalTide APP: Your Portable Health Data Manager, Making Health Management Easier】
In the fast-paced modern life, health management is often "squeezed out" by busyness—you can’t find paper and pen when you want to record your blood pressure, lack systematic data when you want to analyze blood glucose changes, and have no way to integrate multiple health indicators. To help you break through these troubles, VitalTide APP comes into being. It integrates the recording of multi-dimensional health indicators such as blood pressure, blood glucose and heart rate, and serves as your reliable health partner that you can rely on at any time with simple operations and clear data presentation.
Core Features: Comprehensive Coverage to Make Health Data "Traceable"
1. Accurate Recording: Every Measurement Has a Clear Record
● Blood Pressure Recording: Adapted to Daily Monitoring Scenarios  
Whether it is the basic blood pressure measurement after getting up in the morning, or irregular monitoring during work breaks, after exercise, etc., the APP has a convenient recording entrance. You can quickly save the data by manually entering the measured values, no complicated operations are required, and it is easy to track the fluctuation trend of blood pressure.
● Blood Glucose Recording: Distinguish Scenarios to Facilitate Diet Analysis  
For blood glucose management needs, an intuitive and easy-to-use dedicated interface is designed: it supports distinguishing between "pre-meal" and "post-meal" records to help you clearly sort out the correlation between diet and blood glucose changes.
2. Multi-Dimensional Coverage: Meet the Needs of Comprehensive Health Management
In addition to blood pressure and blood glucose, the APP also supports the recording of basic indicators such as heart rate, height and weight, and is also equipped with reference for healthy diet guidelines—from basic physiological data to daily diet suggestions, it covers your health management needs in one stop, eliminating the need to switch between multiple tools.
Disclaimer
VitalTide APP is only used as a tool for recording and organizing health data. It cannot replace medical equipment nor provide medical diagnosis or treatment advice. If you have any health discomfort, need to obtain professional medical opinions or make medical decisions, please be sure to consult a practicing doctor to ensure your health and safety.
